metadata.title: Privacy policy - Zelené stavění.cz
metadata.description: Read how we store and protect your personal data.

1.text1: 1. Company Zelené stavění PS s.r.o., with address Panská 212, Tehov, 251 01, IČ 05749565, registered at the municipal court in Prague, section C, entry 270063, as the personal data controller under article 26 of Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the european parliament and of the council on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data and repealing directive 95/46/EC (general data protection regulation) (before and after as „Regulation“), processes the following personal data in the event of your request for services:
1.text6: - address of realization and permanent residence,

2.text1: 2. Name, surname, email address, address of realization, phone number and messages is necessary to process for creating a price offer, negotiations about this offer or for answering your question. Such processing allows article 6. paragraph 1. point b) of the Regulation. These personal data will be processed by company Zelené stavění PS s.r.o. for the duration of negotiations about concluding a contract between you and Zelené stavění PS s.r.o., at most 1 year from your request, unless you give consent to further processing.
2.text2: For clients with a grant service for a green roof, it is necessary to process name, surname, email address, phone number, address of realization and permanent residence and bank account number. This is due to the obligation to keep all documents and documents related to your request for support and implementation of supported measures. These documents and documents can be requested by the grant if it is doubtful about the correctness of the grant. Such processing allows article 6. paragraph 1. point b) and c) of the Regulation. These personal data will be processed by company Zelené stavění PS s.r.o. for the duration of administration and sustainability of the grant, at most however 10 years from the date of issuing the decision on granting the grant.

3.text1: 3. Please note that according to the act on the protection of personal data, you have the right to:
3.text2: - request from us information about the personal data we process, or request a copy of this personal data,
3.text3: - request from us an explanation about the processing of personal data,
3.text4: - request access to this data and let us update or correct them,
3.text5: - request the deletion of this personal data - this deletion will result in the termination of the contract and will only be carried out if the interests of the controller do not outweigh your right to privacy,
3.text6: - in case of doubts about the compliance with the obligations related to the processing of personal data, contact us or the office for protection of personal data, or the court.

metadata.title: Root wastewater treatment - Zelené stavění.cz
metadata.description: ROOT WASTEWATER TREATMENT. We will make a full realization of the root zone wastewater treatment plant. Email: info@zelenestaveni.cz phone: +420 608 974 908.

Details.title: Root wastewater treatment
Details.text1: The root wastewater treatment plant is essentially a small natural wetland.
Details.text2: It is used to clean household wastewater. According to our experience and that of other countries, this technology is fully comparable in effectiveness to other commonly used technologies. The advantage is the low operating costs. No electricity is needed to power the pump and similar. The efficiency of the wastewater treatment is not dependent on the uniform supply of wastewater.
Details.text3: It can also handle occasional peak loads and production failures. The root wastewater treatment plant creates a dominant on the property and helps maintain a pleasant climate in its surroundings.
Details.title2: What we will ensure for you

image.alt: Icons supporting the explanation

Composition.title: Composition of the root wastewater treatment plant

image.alt: Example of the individual parts of the root wastewater treatment plant

metadata.title: Blower Door test - Zelené stavění.cz
metadata.description: BLOWER DOOR TEST. Professional test of the airtightness of buildings and apartments. Email: info@zelenestaveni.cz phone: +420 608 974 908.

basicInfo.title: Test of airtightness of the envelope
basicInfo.text: We perform the airtightness test of the envelope of buildings and apartments using the so-called Blower Door test. We perform the measurement in accordance with the standard ČSN EN ISO 9972. We are registered in the <link></link> of the project Nová zelená úsporám.

image1.alt: Logo of the project Nová zelená úsporám

image2.alt: Example of the technology used for the measurement in a door

otherInfo.text1: The Blower Door test is primarily required for passive and low-energy houses. The test is recommended to be performed during the construction of the house, after the windows and external doors have been installed, when it is relatively easy to fix the detected leaks.
otherInfo.title2: What the Blower Door test includes

list.item2: possible sealing of air leakage points, waste, etc.
list.item3: own test performed under a negative pressure of 20 to 75Pa

item4.text: the output of the measurement is a protocol containing the determination of the n50 value for the measured object (example of the measurement protocol for download <link></link>)

WeNeed.title1: What will we need from you
WeNeed.text1: Documents for <bold>determining the internal volume and floor area of the building</bold>, e.g. project documentation, protocol from a previous test, etc. If there is neither, we will measure the volume on site.
WeNeed.text2: Information about <bold>accessibility of the intake and exhaust ventilation</bold>, whether we need to bring a ladder and how long it should be. The ventilation duct must be sealed during the test.

list.item1: Completed airtightness layer, all window and door frames installed
list.item2: For the final test: installation of appliances that affect airtightness (heat exchanger, fireplace, kitchen hood, etc.)

link.label: More information in section 6.3 of the Methodological instructions

Showcase.title: Where we perform the test
Showcase.text: We also perform tests in apartment buildings or industrial facilities, where more measuring units are needed.

Detection.title: Detection of air leaks
Detection.text1: We also offer detection of air leaks. Air leaks can be detected using various tools. In addition to the initial detection using the hand, we use detection using an anemometer, smoke generator and thermal imaging.

image2.alt: Control of airtightness of ventilation ducts

Detection.text2: For the correct operation of the ventilation system, it is important to install it correctly. The measurement performed by the specially designed Minneapolis DuctBlaster device will check the quality of the installation of your ventilation ducts.
Detection.text3: We will advise you how to fix and seal the air leaks.

Pricing.title: Pricing
Pricing.subtitle: The pricing may be outdated, so take it more as an indicative and for the exact pricing contact us.

text2.left: Blower Door test including the protocol for NZÚ

text3.left: Blower Door test without the protocol

text4.left: Blower Door test for larger objects and apartment buildings
text4.right: individual price depending on the scope of the measurement

text5.right: 5000 Kč/family house, larger objects individually depending on the scope of the ventilation system

text6.left: Detection of air leaks over the foundation 2 hours

text7.left: Consultation on the project, fixing air leaks etc.

metadata.title: Grants - Zelené stavění.cz
metadata.description: GRANTS. We will provide the necessary documents for obtaining the grant. Email: dotace@zelenestaveni.cz phone: +420 608 974 908.

Details.title: Grants for a green roof
Details.subtitle: Let us make it easier for you to get financial support for your roof
Details.text1: Since January 2017, it is possible to apply for a grant for the implementation of a green roof, which we will gladly help you with as a <link></link> of the project Nová zelená úsporám.
Details.text2: Unfortunately, since July 2023, grants for a green roof can only be applied for <bold>together with other regional support</bold>. Among them are:

list.item3: Area C.1 - replacement of heat sources
list.item4: Area C.2 - preparation of hot water

Details.text3: The grant amounts to <bold1>700-1000 Kč/m²</bold1> of a green roof with a maximum grant amount of <bold2>100 000 Kč</bold2>. The price of a green roof therefore does not have to be high.
Details.text4: You can find more information in the current <link1></link1>, or directly on the page of <link2></link2>.

image.alt: Logo of the project Nová zelená úsporám

HowItWorks.title: How it works
HowItWorks.text1: Our team of experts in the field of construction and grants will take care of the complete technical documentation, which you will need to obtain the grant.
HowItWorks.text2: The grant will be issued by the company that is responsible for the main area of support.
HowItWorks.text3: We know the process well, so we are happy to help you with anything.
HowItWorks.text4: In case of questions about grants, please write to email <link1></link1> or call <link2></link2>.

BlowerDoor.title: Grant for energy efficiency
BlowerDoor.text: During the Blower Door test, we will provide you with the necessary protocol for obtaining the grant.

image.alt: Example of the technology used for the measurement in a door

metadata.title: Garden ponds - Zelené stavění.cz
metadata.description: GARDEN PONDS. We will make a full realization of the garden pond. Email: info@zelenestaveni.cz phone: +420 608 974 908.

Details.title: Realization of garden ponds
Details.text1: Garden ponds are a beautiful addition to any garden, bringing a piece of nature right into your home.
Details.text2: Our realization of garden ponds focuses on the harmonious connection of water with the surrounding landscape, creating oases of peace and tranquility. Each pond is carefully designed to harmonize with the character of your garden and naturally fit into its environment. We use only high-quality materials and modern technology, which ensures a long life and easy maintenance of the pond. It is also possible to add water plants.
Details.text3: Our services include a complete realization from design to final installation of the garden pond. With our professional team, you can expect an individual approach and expert advice in all phases of the project. The pond can also be designed as a swimming pond, making your garden even more attractive for relaxation and refreshment during hot summer days. We believe that a garden pond is not only an aesthetic element, but also a source of relaxation and joy. With our help, your dream of a perfect garden can become a reality.

OurServices.title: What we will ensure for you

image.alt: Icons supporting the explanation

metadata.title: Thermal imaging - Zelené stavění.cz
metadata.description: THERMAL IMAGING. We perform the detection of heat leaks using thermal imaging. Email: info@zelenestaveni.cz phone: +420 608 974 908.

HeatLoss.title: Detection of heat leaks
HeatLoss.text1: We offer the detection of heat leaks using thermal imaging.
HeatLoss.text2: In addition to the infrared image, we also record a digital image, which allows us to combine them together, which significantly simplifies the analysis of infrared images. The temperature sensitivity is 0.1°C. The range of measured temperatures is -20°C to 250°C.

image.alt: Fluke Ti10 thermal camera
Example of measurement using a thermal camera

WhenToMeasure.text1: Defects in building insulation or heating systems can be detected in the heating season, so in the winter period. Measurement using a thermal camera is also possible at night. The temperature difference between the outside and inside should be at least 15°C. Defects in electrical installations, photovoltaic panels, etc. can be detected throughout the year.
WhenToMeasure.title2: What is included in measurement using thermal imaging

list.item1: Images of the outside and inside of the building, as well as requested objects in visible and infrared spectrum
list.item2: Analysis of images (highlighting the warmest and coldest places or temperatures in any point of the image)
list.item3: Preparation of a protocol in PDF format

Findings.title: What can be detected using thermal imaging

list.item1: Defects in building insulation or poor insulation execution
list.item2: Poor sealing of windows or doors
list.item4: Hidden leaks in the building envelope
list.item7: Defects in electrical installations - overheating of distribution boards, cables, circuit breakers, motors
list.item8: Defects in photovoltaic and thermal panels
list.item9: Defects in insulation of heating circuits and storage tanks

image.alt: Example of measurement using a thermal camera

Pricing.title: Pricing
Pricing.subtitle: The pricing may be outdated, so take it more as an indicative and for the exact pricing contact us.

text2.left: Family house (approximately 30 to 60 images depending on the need, protocol in PDF)

text3.left: Other objects, apartment buildings, commercial premises

text4.left: Analysis of problems, recommendations for repairs and more

metadata.title: Green roofs - Zelené stavění.cz
metadata.description: GREEN ROOFS. We build green roofs from A to Z. Email: info@zelenestaveni.cz phone: +420 608 974 908.

Considerations.title: We build green roofs from A to Z
Considerations.subtitle1: What to consider before building a green roof?
Considerations.text2: How much do you want to invest
Considerations.text3: Possible load on the roof structure

Composition.title: We can build the whole roof composition
Composition.subtitle: We guarantee you the whole roof

image.alt: Analysis of the individual parts of the green roof composition

OurServices.title: Our services
OurServices.text1: Send us the drawing of the roof, the location and your idea. We will prepare an offer for you. We believe that together we will find a solution that will satisfy you not only aesthetically, but also financially.

Weather.title: We are not made of sugar. We work as is necessary.

image.alt: Example of how we are not stopped by any weather

Types.title: Types of green roofs
Types.text1: Green roofs store water naturally, absorb dust and do barely heat up even in extreme temperatures. They protect the roof insulation even better than a gravel embankment and they extend its life. Thanks to reduced charges for drainage of rainwater, it is possible to save money in many cities that have charges divided into water and sewage. Urban plans increasingly support or at least acknowledge greening of roofs as a compensation measure. This creates valuable biotopes.
Types.text2: With each green roof, a new living space is created. Intensive greening with areas of grass and plants, areas for paths and rest can be created and used as a garden. On the other hand, extensive greening is created with plants that are not demanding and mainly low-growing, and are meant to be walkable only for control and care. Both forms of greening create valuable and interesting alternative biotopes for plants and microorganisms. They return something to nature from what was lost due to the construction.

button.label: By type of vegetation: extensive, intensive

vegetace.text1: The goal of extensive greening is a naturally based vegetation with low load on the area and minimal care. The plants used to create the vegetation are often sedums. It is also supplemented with drought-resistant herbs. Extensive greening requires minimal care. In the first year or two, before the plants cover the whole surface of the roof, it is necessary to occasionally remove any invasive weeds. Sometimes also to fertilize with slow-dissolving fertilizer, depending on the type of substrate used. Sometimes it is necessary to supplement dead plants after winter etc.
vegetace.text2: Intensive greening provides a wide range of possibilities for creating and using it as a garden on the roof. It is possible to create recreational areas and plant trees. With proper dimensioning of the vegetation support layer, proper watering and fertilization, the conditions for growth of plants on the roof are almost as good as in the ground. It is necessary to pay attention, for example, to the stability of trees and possible negative effects of the building, such as sunlit facades. The design of intensive greening and especially the selection of plants according to the object requires appropriate professional knowledge. For dimensioning the greening support layer, simple formulas can be used, namely „height of growth/10 = thickness of the substrate layer“. Grass and soil-covering plants need at least 20 cm of substrate. Even with large water storage capacity of substrates, intensive greening and especially grass must be regularly watered during the dry period. As with any garden near a home, there is also a direct relationship between the condition of the vegetation and the care for it.

zatizeni.title: Statics - load of the roof structure
zatizeni.text: The load of the roof structure is one of the key criteria for greening. For intensive greening, at least 300 kg/m² of surface load should be calculated according to the proposed substrate thickness. For extensive greening, the load is about 150 kg/m² in the saturated state of water. This applies to the use of substrates. Today, mineral mats can also be used, which significantly reduces the load to about 50 kg/m². To this load, always add the snow load for the given location.

button.label: By slope: mild slope, sloping roofs, steep roofs

sklon.title: Slope of the roof
sklon.text: It can be said that today it is possible to green any slope of the roof. Of course, the greater the slope, the more complex and expensive the solution. Slopes up to 15° are usually not necessary to secure against landslides. For larger slopes, it is necessary to secure the substrate against sliding. The greater the slope, the more fixing elements must be used. This must be solved individually for each roof. Fixing is generally performed either using the lower edge of the roof, fixing over the ridge of the roof, fixing in the roof area, or a combination of these types.

cena.title: Financial cost
cena.text1: The total cost of the green roof is always set individually for the specific roof. For extensive roofs with a slope of up to 15° and the most common composition, the costs are around these values:

list.item2: Laying of hydroizolator including cladding: 600 Kč/m²
list.item3: Laying of drainage and hydroaccumulation layer: 250 Kč/m²
list.item4: Laying of filter and protective textile: 125 Kč/m²
list.item5: Substrate and its placement on the roof: 350 Kč/m²

cena.text2: Prices are shown without VAT. The price does not include transport to the construction site.
cena.text3: Planting of plants is calculated at 25 sedum seedlings/m². A cheaper variant is the use of seeds, or cuttings. The significantly more expensive variant is the seedling carpet.
cena.text4: There is also a simpler one-layer composition with the omission of the drainage layer.
cena.text5: If there is already a hydroizolator on the roof, but it is not resistant to penetration, it is possible to lay a special thin membrane against penetration on it, which does not need to be welded.
cena.text6: We use standard PVC welded film as a hydroizolator, occasionally EPDM film or asphalt strips.

narocnost.title: Roof slope
narocnost.text1: Extensive green roofs are also often called maintenance-free. This is true only to a certain extent. Once the plants cover the whole roof, it is not necessary to care too much about the roof. However, if we want the roof to also look nice, it is good to go up on the roof at least once a year to pull out weeds, fill in places that have become bare, add slowly dissolving fertilizer, check and clean the gutters if necessary.
narocnost.text2: Intensive green roofs are just as demanding as with a garden or a park. It depends again on how we want the roof to look.

image.alt: Icon of a sedum

Grants.title: Grants for green roofs
Grants.text1: Since January 2017, it is possible to apply for a grant for the implementation of a green roof, which we will gladly help you with.
Grants.text2: The grant amounts to 700-1000 Kč/m² of a green roof and you can find more at <link></link>. The price of a green roof therefore does not have to be high.

image.alt: Logo of the project Nová zelená úsporám

strechy.heading: GREEN ROOFS
strechy.text: Green roofs store water, capture dust and do not heat up. We realize green roofs from A to Z. We can also help you with the grant for Nová zelená úsporám.

jezirka.heading: GARDEN PONDS
jezirka.text: Garden pond is a design and functional element of the garden, which will cool the air in hot days. We will create a pond as an ornamental or swimming pond, including water plants and filters.

blower.text: The Blower Door test is primarily required for passive and low-energy houses. The test is recommended to be performed during the construction of the house, after the windows and external doors are installed, when it is still relatively easy to fix the detected leaks.
